snippet: Willie Mays Aikens, a World Series star for the Kansas City Royals, was convicted in 1994 on four counts of crack cocaine distribution and one count of using of a firearm during drug trafficking.
abstract: Willie Mays Aikens, a World Series star for the Kansas City Royals, was convicted in 1994 on four counts of crack cocaine distribution and one count of using of a firearm during drug trafficking.

headline.main: Former Royal Aikens Tells His Story
